lines.text: Who invited you?
I did! What are you gonna do about it?
[the roc capsizes Popeye's ship]
Whoa! Man the lifeboats!
[Popeye falls into the sea, but climbs aboard the overturned hull, carrying Wimpy with him]
That was a nice ship we had once...
[after defeating Boola]
Who's gonna make who like chicken fricassicassissy?

[singing]
I'm Popeye the Sailor Man / Popeye the Sailor Man / I'm strong to the finich, cause I eats me spinach / I'm Popeye the Sailor Man! I'm one tough gazookus, which hates all palookas / but takes on the up and square / I biffs 'em and boffs 'em , and always out-ruffs 'em / but none of them gets nowhere! / If anyone messes to risk, me fisk / It's bop and it's wham, understand? / So keep good behavior, that's your one lifesaver / with Popeye the Sailor Man! I'm Popeye the Sailor Man / Popeye the Sailor Man / I'm strong to the finich, cause I eats me spinach / I'm Popeye the Swab-Wailor Man!

[to Wimpy]
Hey, did you see the same thing I saw?... Better take another look at that thing to see what that was...
[takes out a telescope to look at the rokh]

[toots his pipe]
That's the biggest buzzard I ever saw!
There's only room for one great sailor in this world, and that's ME!
Oh, sez you?
[the two charge at each other]
Don't you think we'd better talk this thing over...?
Try and get out of THIS one!
[throws Popeye to Boola the two-headed giant]
Give it to him, Popeye! Give him the twister punch!

[twisting his arm]
One twister punch coming up!

[to Wimpy]
Hey, we gotta save Olive Oyl! Into the drink!
[jumps into the ocean with Wimpy in tow]

[reading a sign]
"The Isle of Sindbad. Enter Not! For whoso-ever passeth in... passeth out!"
[a duck pops up on Sindbad's island]
Ooh, luncheon!
[follows the duck with a meat grinder]
[Wimpy appears in Sindbad's lair]
How did you get in here?
[Wimpy chases a duck but it escapes him]
Fowled again... I must resort to my last hamburger.
[which is stolen by the duck]
Hey, I wants me girl!
Oh, yeah?
Yeah!
Who are you?

[sing-song]
I'm Popeye the Sailor Man! Who are you?
Who am I?
You heard what I said.
WHO AM I?
That's what I said.
Who's the most remarkable extra-ordinary fellow?
YOU! Sindbad the Sailor!
Who's the most phenomenal extra-special kind of fellow?
YOU! Sindbad the Sailor!
I'm afraid of nobody under the sun/ All I say is "Boo!" and my enemies run! Who's the most remarkable extraordinary fellow? Who?
Popeye the Sailor! You got a long way to go, young fellow...

[enraged, grabs Popeye]
Well, let's see how brave you are!
[throws him into the talons of the roc]
[Popeye's can of spinach rolls off a cliff... ]

[catching the can]
Ah-ah-ah-ah! Don't leave me now!
[first lines]
[Sindbad steps out of his island home, and slaps two lions]

I'm Sindbad the Sailor, so hearty and hale / I live on an island on the back of a whale / It's a whale of an island - that's not a bad joke - / Its lord and its master is this handsome bloke! Who's the most remarkable extra-ordinary fellow?
[the lions roar]
Sindbad the Sailor!
[Sindbad comes across Boola, the two-headed giant]
Now look at this monster, so strong and so huge / He'd frighten King Kong, but he's only my stooge / The capture of Boola for me was just fun / Whoever says two heads are better than one?
[Boola breaks free and tries to attack Sindbad, but is sent cowering with one blow]
Who's the most remarkable extra-ordinary fellow?

[both heads]
YOU! Sindbad the Sailor!
[after hearing Popeye sing]

[dismembering his telescope]
Who fouls the air with notes so sour / and dares to challenge Sindbad's power?
[throws the pieces in the air... and gets hit by them as they come down]

[cradling a beaten Popeye]
Come for to sleep, my baby kid / With peaches and cream, my baby kid / If you don't sleep, my baby kid / I close for you your two eyes, like this!
[pokes Popeye's eyes]

[to Boola]
Two against one, huh?
[knocks Boola's two heads, twice]
How do you like that?
[the two heads start arguing]

[left head]
What for you like that? Popeye smack our face!

[right head]
How do YOU like about that? You hold that Popeye in this hand!

[left head]
Bicarbonate, if I had that mug in this hand, I make from him special dish of chopped fricassee-sees!

[right head]
I do not like chop-you-apart fricassee-sees!

[left head]
I make for you to like it!
[Boola's left hand punches his right head]
I scare all creation on land or on sea / but talk about women, they all fall for me! / I take my adventures wherever they're found / I don't want to brag, folks, but I've been around!
[passes by a dragon and a vulture]
Who's the most phenomenal extra-special kind of fellow?
[both dragon and vulture keen out]
Sindbad the Sailor!
[Sindbad comes across a trunk of jewels, flanked by two snakes]
From the Valley of Serpents these diamonds I took / I cleaned out those serpents with one dirty look!
[proves his claim by staring at the snakes and making them faint]
[Sindbad looks up at a giant bird, the rokh]
On one of my travels I ran into this / Now there was a thrill I'd be sorry to miss!
[the rokh screeches]
He spread out his wings, and the sunlight grew dim / He took me in his feet, but I made off with HIM! Who's the most remarkable extra-ordinary fellow?
[the rokh screeches]
Sindbad the Sailor!
[Sindbad delivers a kick to a giant snake that tries to eat him]
Who's the most phenomenal extra-special kind of fellow?
[the snake yowls]
Sindbad the Sailor! I'm afraid of nobody under the sun / All I say is "Boo!" and my enemies run! / Who's the most remarkable extra-ordinary fellow?
[hears Popeye singing]
[Sindbad summons his rokh]
Wreck that ship!
[the rokh screeches]
But bring me the woman!
[the rokh winks and cackles in understanding, and takes off]
[the rokh capsizes Popeye's ship]

[clinging to the hull]
Oh! Oh, oh dear, what happened?
[the rokh snatches Olive and flies off]

[hysteric]
Oh, h-h-h-help! P-p-p-p-Popeye, save me! Oooh, let me go! Let me go! LET ME GO! No, DON'T let me go!
Give up, and give us a little smack...

[hitting Sindbad]
I'll give you a smack, all right! All right! There!
Help! Popeye, save me!
I'm coming Olive, I just got a little wall here!
[the rokh carries Popeye in his talons]

Oh! Oh, what's this? Hey, let me down, you big overgrown canary! What're you doing, taking me for a ride or something like that? Hey, let me loose, you big feathered...! I'm not going your way! Come on, let me go...!
[as a tearful Olive and a laughing Sindbad watch, the rokh carries Popeye to an island and explosive noises occur... ]

[in tears]
Oh, Popeye! Oh, Popeye, my Popeye, come back! Come back to me!
[Popeye returns with the rokh roasted on a giant platter]
There you are, with gravy!
[Sindbad moans in shock, while Popeye and Olive laugh]

[laughs]
Oh, his goose is cooked!

[being pushed by Sindbad]
Hey, what are you doing? Hey, you can push me just so far...
[Sindbad squeezes Popeye so hard is face turns beetroot-red, and even temporarily becomes a beetroot]
Beets is for beat!
[hits Sindbad]

[hits Sindbad]
Peekaboo!
[last lines]
Who's the most remarkable extra-ordinary fella?
YOU! Popeye the Sailor!
